title: Experts share tips on how to maximize your dollars during holiday shopping

article.title: Experts share tips on how to maximize your dollars during holiday shopping
article.description:
Business 
 
 
 
 
 
 November 29, 2025 7:43 AM ET 
 
 
Heard on Weekend Edition Saturday 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Alina Selyukh
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Experts share tips on how to maximize your dollars during holiday shopping 
 
 
 Audio will be available later today. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The holiday shopping season is upon us. We share some tips from pros on how to get the most for your dollars.
